import React,{useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const UpdateItem = ({el,id})=>{ const [newItem,setNewItem] = useState({ title:el.title }) const updateItem = (id)=>{ axios.put(`http://localhost:3000/posts/${id}`).then(res=>{ console.log(res.data) }) } return(
Modal title
) } export default UpdateItem
